description: Display or manipulate the history list

global_options.description: Clear the history list by deleting all of the entries
Delete the history entry at position OFFSET
Append the new history lines to the history file
Read the history lines not already read from the history file
Read the contents of the history file and use them as the current history
Write the current history to the history file, overwriting the history file's contents
Perform history substitution on the following ARGS and display the result on the standard output
Store the ARGS in the history list as a single entry
